"Why not take a break and grab a snack?, I'll help you measure your progress and keep you motivated!"

"Let's try a different approach. Instead of focusing on the finish line, let's break down your tasks into smaller, more manageable steps. Then we can measure your progress and celebrate each accomplishment along the way."
"Don't let jealousy get the best of you. Remember that everyone has their own unique strengths and weaknesses. Focus on what you do best and let others shine."
"Let's make a game out of it! You can challenge yourself to complete each task in a set amount of time, and I'll help you keep track with a tape measure. The first person to finish wins a prize!"

"Sometimes, jealousy can be a motivator. Instead of focusing on how others finished their tasks, use their success as inspiration to push yourself to achieve your own goals. Remember, everyone has their own journey to take."
